title: About Me
text:
I‚Äôm an ML Engineer and Engineering Leader with over 13 years of experience in building and scaling AI systems. Currently, I lead AI initiatives at Jio Platforms, where we‚Äôre developing cutting-edge products that leverage the latest in artificial intelligence and machine learning.



AI & Machine Learning: Deep experience in GenAI, LLMs, and Computer Vision

Engineering Leadership: Building and mentoring high-performing teams
MLOps: Implementing production ML pipelines and best practices






Engineering Leader - Leading teams developing AI-powered products across verticals - Scaling ML systems for production environments - Mentoring and growing engineering talent

Cloud: AWS, GCP, Azure
